name: zefiel
text: Yesterday's positive feedback led to a 20% increase on the size and prominence of the bulge in the unitard, leading to much more visibility by the readers. Now, if you'll turn to page 20 on the briefings I have given you, you'll see how when under extreme magnification the bulge actually is a cleverly hidden subliminal advertisement for Tall Hot Brutes, the brand that as such... and thus we can expect profits of...

name: heath
text:
I shudder when I think about the tiny digital caliper you must have used to measure and figure the precise percentage of increase. Oh, think of the calculations...

That is not what I want in my mind as I drift off to sleep tonight.

name: rowboat
text: Notice that Téodor is summoning the Magical Martha Tits through sheer will and the steadfast power of imagineering. As the Saddest Symphony reaches crescendo, they find full bloom. Wisely, he wills them away in time for his Nicholson act. He's a pro.

name: professoryes
text:
My father met Jack Nicholson in a bar once. He asked my dad if he wanted an autograph. He declined, so Jack said "Okay. I'll buy you a beer."

Later, my dad told me that Jack Nicholson doing an impersonation of himself was worse than other people doing an impersonation of him. It was a Charlie Chaplin paradox for me.

name: comrade_tom
text: HAHAHA MY FATHER ONCE KNEW A MAN

text: haha what?  if you're being sarcastic, i can't tell, but  I think these strips are hilarious.  Teodor is the man.  Salma Hayek impression was wonderful but the Martha Stewart one is pretty good too.  his Jack Nicholson is absolutely terrifying!

text: 57th comment, weeeeh. I'm glad T didnt go all the way in the Martha Stewart in the shower impression, we all know what she does with food when she's alone.

name: hellofyellin
text: Congrats on the Iggy, Onstad.

name: paperboy_2000
text:
Dang, Todd. T-bag ain't just doing impersonations up there. He's doing impressions . He's getting right at the heart of these figures.

The essence of Martha Stuart is a deliciously sad shower aria sung with cradled breasts. The essence of Jack Nicholson is beating down a squirrel in a necktie to express his passion for a 25-year old punk band.

name: mrcool1122
text: A comment left by mrcool1122 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by robotman, tetsujin, mortshire)

name: mollybloom11
text: A comment left by mollybloom11 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by silver_lake, autrepoupee, solobuttons)

name: mollybloom11
text: although it's def. not entirely without its merits. One being Teodor's perfect Nicholsonian eyebrows.

name: lastlarf
text: I do agree that this storyline has not raised as many chuckles, rough or smooth, as most.

name: autrepoupee
text: how does this get chubbied and the rest DO get lamed? are you supposed to just be completely deferential when saying an arc just isn't as funny as some others i do not get "it"

name: ttagxamm
text:
I think it is in the tone. Too many negative comments amount to "This sucks," or (and I quote,) "another AWFUL AWFUL strip." That gets tiresome, and out come the lames. Frankly the many comments that say little more than "Awesome" or "Do you guys remember that one line from panel three? How funny was that?" are a bit tiresome too. But they match the generally friendly, wisecracking tone of the place.

Also, I think it helps to predict that your comment will be lamed away. This often provokes the opposite reaction. Alternately, taking the time to include an animated gif of breasts with would probably reduce any comment's lame count.

name: autrepoupee
text: Ah, good point about the tone, and the good titties! Somehow, I didn't think of that. Also yeah, a little self-effacement always earns you less ire anywheres you go.

name: mollybloom11
text: i predicted the lames, and the lames, they came anyway.  What can you do?  I think it's perfectly acceptable to not find every single achewood totally faultless.  It is definitely unfortunate that negative comments aren't allowed on here- just because I don't fawn over every strip doesn't mean I am any less of a fan.

name: ttagxamm
text:
I hear you, sister.

I've railed against certain kinds of negative comments in the past*, but have decided not to give out any more lames. It's more fun to run out of chubbies, I figure.

* Honestly, folks, when you talk about jumping the shark, all right thinking people just shake their heads sadly and turn their heads away sadly. It is a Showbiz type of thing to say.

name: rowboat
text: A brave and pacific stance! But with some of these overly aggressive jock types who've found their way here I don't know how you can resist. I am inspired, and I will try to lame less, but I can't put it down completely. It's too well deserved on some occasions. My resolution: I'll save lames for mean-spirited comments only and leave bad jokes alone. I feel better already.

name: ttagxamm
text: Dunno how you can tell the jocks from the jerks from the geeks from the freaks.  I've been all those types from time to time.  In any case I wish to support your new resolution but, having taken my own advice, I am out chubbies.

name: rowboat
text: Having been one once, I can smell a jock mentality from, um, through the internets, I guess. And worry not about the chubbies, friend. Worldly accolades are of little import, as I have found the One True Path.

name: rowboat
text: And two short months later, I've basically become a troll (albeit a relatively soft-core one). I'm a decent person. I just get bored.

name: pygmalion00
text: Where's the all kinds of handjobs?

name: ttagxamm
text:
Perhaps due to budget cuts, now that Ray's withdrawn his support?

I suppose it's not impossible that Teodor could do the deed but, honestly, why find out?

name: phy
text: Teodor's impressions are achieved entirely with his eyebrows and lower lip.

name: spinynorman
text:
Don't forget the breasts, dude. Accentuating the man-titties is a crucial part of T's impersonations.

...for all of them, really, even Mr. Nicholson's, and even if Teodor doesn't know it.

name: domini
text: They're gonna cash it all in for ONE MORE RIP on the PIPE, son!

Teodor's Nicholson shades are not entirely dissimilar to Ray's glasses.

Right?

Anyone care to make one? Sadly, my skills would not pay the bills.
